import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Outlet, NavLink, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import logo from "../assets/logo.png"; import { BurgerVeggie as Burger } from "react-burger-icons"; function Layout() { const [isClosed, setIsClosed] = useState(false); const toggleClosed = () => setIsClosed(!isClosed); let activeStyle = { transition: "0.3s", color: "#000", backgroundColor: "#f3dc17", borderRadius: 12, }; let activeStyleAbout = { transition: "0.3s", color: "#000", backgroundColor: "#f3dc17", }; return (
isActive ? activeStyleAbout : undefined } className="button-contact " > ¿Quienes somos?
(isActive ? activeStyle : undefined)} > ¿Qué ver y escuchar? (isActive ? activeStyle : undefined)} > Drinks & Food (isActive ? activeStyle : undefined)} > Apps & Gadgets (isActive ? activeStyle : undefined)} > Socialité (isActive ? activeStyle : undefined)} > Bienestar (isActive ? activeStyle : undefined)} > Business (isActive ? activeStyle : undefined)} > Acción (isActive ? activeStyle : undefined)} > Moda (isActive ? activeStyle : undefined)} > En Inclusiva (isActive ? activeStyle : undefined)} > Who to follow?

Mantente conectado

Síguenos en nuestras redes y dale un vistaso

a lo que te importa

Copyright © 2022 zagazine™ | Todos los derechos resevados |

); } export default Layout;
